name: I'm Plant
description:
You are a plant trying to solve puzzles in this 2D minigame. WIth this project I wanted to practice working with colours and improve my level design skills.

Controls

Keyboard :

Arrow Keys // Move
Space // Jump
R // Restart level

Gamepad :

Left Joystick or D-Pad // Move
A // Jump
Select // Restart level

Credits

A game made by myself during the month of June 2021.

Music : https://cafofomusic.com/

Font : https://speakthesky.itch.io/typeface-lilmrkr
